title: Breaking Down 'Succession' S2E4 | The Watch
description:
Your number one boys break down S2E4 of Succession, "Safe Room." They talk about Shiv and Kendall's tender moment (2:19), who won the episode (10:04), and the biggest burn of the week (18:39).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Jason Concepcion
